org.resthub.core.service
Interface GenericService<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - Domain model class managed, must be an Entity
PK - Primary key class of T
All Known Subinterfaces:
AuthorizationService, GenericResourceService<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthorizationServiceImpl, GenericResourceServiceImpl, GenericServiceImpl
public interface GenericService<T,ID extends java.io.Serializable>

Generic Service interface.
